# fi-ACME-001: OAuth Login

> **target_product:** acme-shop  
> **Target Feature:** f-ACME-001-user-login  
> **Status:** Draft

## AS-IS
Users can only log in with email/password (per f-ACME-001 Â§Main Flow).

## TO-BE
Users can also log in with Google OAuth.

## Impact
